text:
Summary



Power Grid begins commercial operations of Pole II of the Champa-Kurukshetra HVDC TerminalAir India ties up with PNB, IndusInd for Rs 3,250 crore loan, according to PTIIDBI Bank sells 9 percent stake in SIDBIGE Power India won an order worth Rs 328 crore from Doosan Power IndiaAndhra Bank to cut base rate by 15 basis points to 9.55 percent






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, fell 0.13 percent to 9,723.50 as of 7:30 am





Get ready for today's trade.https://t.co/kiLjK57Qw7— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) September 28, 2017






Here are the stocks to watch out for in today’s session:
title: Stocks To Watch: Power Grid, ONGC, Reliance Industries, Jain Irrigation, GE Power India
